articles.headline: Jan. 6 Panel Moves to Recommend Criminal Charges Against Bannon
articles.snippet: The House select committee investigating the Capitol riot will vote next week to recommend a criminal contempt of Congress charge against Stephen K. Bannon after he defied a subpoena.
articles.abstract: The House select committee investigating the Capitol riot will vote next week to recommend a criminal contempt of Congress charge against Stephen K. Bannon after he defied a subpoena.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The chairman of the House inquiry into the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol said the committee would move next week to recommend that Stephen K. Bannon, a former top adviser to President Donald J. Trump, face criminal contempt charges for refusing to cooperate with its investigation.
articles.byline: By Luke Broadwater and Katie Benner

articles.headline: Deadly Clashes in Beirut Escalate Fears Over Lebanon’s Dysfunction
articles.snippet: The fighting further traumatized the small Mediterranean country, a patchwork of sects that has tumbled into an abyss of devastating political and economic crises.
articles.abstract: The fighting further traumatized the small Mediterranean country, a patchwork of sects that has tumbled into an abyss of devastating political and economic crises.
articles.lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Lebanon — Armed clashes between sectarian militias transformed Beirut neighborhoods into a deadly war zone on Thursday, raising fears that violence could fill the void left by the near-collapse of the Lebanese state.
articles.byline: By Ben Hubbard and Marc Santora

articles.headline: Netflix Loses Its Glow as Critics Target Chappelle Special
articles.snippet: The comedian Dave Chappelle’s comments on transgender people and gender in “The Closer” have led to outside criticism and internal unrest at the company that upended Hollywood.
articles.abstract: The comedian Dave Chappelle’s comments on transgender people and gender in “The Closer” have led to outside criticism and internal unrest at the company that upended Hollywood.
articles.lead_paragraph: It was looking like a great year for Netflix. It surpassed 200 million subscribers, won 44 Emmys and gave the world “Squid Game,” a South Korean series that became a sensation.

articles.headline: F.D.A. Panel Recommends Booster for Many Moderna Vaccine Recipients
articles.snippet: Those eligible for the extra shot would include adults over 65 and others at high risk — the same groups now eligible for a Pfizer-BioNTech boost
articles.abstract: Those eligible for the extra shot would include adults over 65 and others at high risk — the same groups now eligible for a Pfizer-BioNTech boost
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A panel of independent medical experts on Thursday unanimously recommended Moderna booster shots for many of those who had received the company’s coronavirus vaccine, paving the way to sharply expand the number of people eligible for an additional shot in the United States.
articles.byline: By Sharon LaFraniere and Noah Weiland

articles.headline: Rising Rents Are Fueling Inflation, Posing Trouble for the Fed
articles.snippet: Economic policymakers have said inflation will prove temporary, but rising rents may challenge that view and pressure Washington to react.
articles.abstract: Economic policymakers have said inflation will prove temporary, but rising rents may challenge that view and pressure Washington to react.
articles.lead_paragraph: Terrell McCallum, a private wealth adviser in Dallas, spends a lot of time thinking about markets and interest rates. He knows that the Federal Reserve targets 2 percent annual price increases on average, so it was a shock when he learned that his rent would increase a whopping 10 percent this year.

articles.headline: Terry McAuliffe’s Other Obstacle in Virginia Race: Democrats’ Apathy
articles.snippet: Though the state is getting bluer, voters’ exhaustion is imperiling the former governor’s comeback attempt against his Republican rival, Glenn Youngkin.
articles.abstract: Though the state is getting bluer, voters’ exhaustion is imperiling the former governor’s comeback attempt against his Republican rival, Glenn Youngkin.
articles.lead_paragraph: RICHMOND, Va. — Terry McAuliffe doesn’t do subtext well.

articles.headline: Plant-Based Food Companies Face Critics: Environmental Advocates
articles.snippet: Some analysts say they cannot determine if plant-based foods are more sustainable than meat because the companies are not transparent about their emissions.
articles.abstract: Some analysts say they cannot determine if plant-based foods are more sustainable than meat because the companies are not transparent about their emissions.
articles.lead_paragraph: To hear more audio stories from publications like The New York Times, download Audm for iPhone or Android.

articles.headline: Retail sales were lifted in September by spending and higher prices.
articles.snippet: The 0.7% increase was better than expected. Rising consumer prices were a factor, but economists said the results showed Americans wanted to get out and shop.
articles.abstract: The 0.7% increase was better than expected. Rising consumer prices were a factor, but economists said the results showed Americans wanted to get out and shop.
articles.lead_paragraph: Retail sales rose unexpectedly in September, as American consumers shook off fast-rising prices, shortages of goods, and the Delta variant outbreak in many parts of the country.

articles.headline: Longtime U.K. Lawmaker Stabbed to Death in Attack Labeled Terrorism
articles.snippet: David Amess, a Conservative member of Parliament, was holding a meeting in his constituency at the time. He is the second politician killed in an attack in just over five years.
articles.abstract: David Amess, a Conservative member of Parliament, was holding a meeting in his constituency at the time. He is the second politician killed in an attack in just over five years.
articles.lead_paragraph: LEIGH-ON-SEA, England — For the second time in little more than five years, a British lawmaker meeting with constituents was killed in full view of the public, this time in a genteel seaside town, where the victim, a Conservative Party member of Parliament, was fatally stabbed on Friday inside a church.
articles.byline: By Megan Specia, Mark Landler and Stephen Castle
